verses.verse: ( Zephaniah Prophesies Judgment on Judah) ( 470 13:36-43 ) דְּבַר־ <WH1697> də·ḇar- [This is] the word יְהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> hā·yāh came אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to צְפַנְיָה֙ <WH6846> ṣə·p̄an·yāh Zephaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son כּוּשִׁ֣י <WH3569> kū·šî of Cushi, בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- the son גְּדַלְיָ֔ה <WH1436> gə·ḏal·yāh of Gedaliah, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> ’ă·mar·yāh of Amariah, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חִזְקִיָּ֑ה <WH2396> ḥiz·qî·yāh of Hezekiah, בִּימֵ֛י <WH3117> bî·mê in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> yō·šî·yā·hū of Josiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> ’ā·mō·wn of Amon מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah:

אָסֹ֨ף <WH622> ’ā·sōp̄ “ I will completely sweep away אָסֵ֜ף <WH5486> ’ā·sêp̄ ... כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> kōl everything מֵעַ֛ל <WH5921> mê·‘al from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh of the earth, ” נְאֻם־ <WH5002> nə·’um- declares יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD.

אָסֵ֨ף <WH5486> ’ā·sêp̄ “ I will sweep away אָדָ֜ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām man וּבְהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> ū·ḇə·hê·māh and beast; אָסֵ֤ף <WH5486> ’ā·sêp̄ I will sweep away עוֹף־ <WH5775> ‘ō·wp̄- the birds הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim of the air, וּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> ū·ḏə·ḡê and the fish הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hay·yām of the sea, וְהַמַּכְשֵׁל֖וֹת <WH4384> wə·ham·maḵ·šê·lō·wṯ and the idols אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- with הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> hā·rə·šā·‘îm their wicked  worshipers . ( Or and the idols that cause the wicked to stumble) וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <WH3772> wə·hiḵ·rat·tî I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> hā·’ā·ḏām mankind מֵעַ֛ל <WH5921> mê·‘al from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> hā·’ă·ḏā·māh of the earth, ” נְאֻם־ <WH5002> nə·’um- declares יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD.

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> wə·nā·ṭî·ṯî “ I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏî My hand עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- against יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh Judah וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> wə·‘al and against כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yō·wō·šə·ḇê who dwell יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> yə·rū·šā·lim in Jerusalem. וְהִכְרַתִּ֞י <WH3772> wə·hiḵ·rat·tî I will cut off מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm place הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz·zeh this אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> šə·’ār every remnant הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> hab·ba·‘al of Baal אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- -, שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> šêm the names הַכְּמָרִ֖ים <WH3649> hak·kə·mā·rîm of the idolatrous עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- and הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> hak·kō·hă·nîm [pagan] priests —

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הַמִּשְׁתַּחֲוִ֥ים <WH7812> ham·miš·ta·ḥă·wîm those who bow עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on הַגַּגּ֖וֹת <WH1406> hag·gag·gō·wṯ the rooftops לִצְבָ֣א <WH6635> liṣ·ḇā to worship  the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·mā·yim of heaven, וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הַמִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוִים֙ <WH7812> ham·miš·ta·ḥă·wîm those who bow down הַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֣ים <WH7650> han·niš·bā·‘îm and swear לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh by the LORD וְהַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֖ים <WH7650> wə·han·niš·bā·‘îm but also swear בְּמַלְכָּֽם׃ <WH4428> bə·mal·kām by Milcom, ( Or by their king; Milcom is a variant of Molech; see and .)

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- and הַנְּסוֹגִ֖ים <WH5472> han·nə·sō·w·ḡîm those who turn back מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> mê·’a·ḥă·rê from [following] יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> wa·’ă·šer - לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- neither בִקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> ḇiq·šū seeking אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō nor דְרָשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <WH1875> ḏə·rā·šu·hū inquiring of Him. ”

( The Day of the LORD) ( 460 4:1-6 ;  590 5:1-11 ;  680 3:8-13 ) הַ֕ס <WH2013> has Be silent מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê in the presence אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD, כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî for קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> qā·rō·wḇ is near. י֣וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm the Day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Indeed, הֵכִ֧ין <WH3559> hê·ḵîn has prepared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> ze·ḇaḥ a sacrifice; הִקְדִּ֥ישׁ <WH6942> hiq·dîš He has consecrated קְרֻאָֽיו׃ <WH7121> qə·ru·’āw His guests.

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh “ - בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> bə·yō·wm On the Day זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> ze·ḇaḥ sacrifice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD’s וּפָקַדְתִּ֥י <WH6485> ū·p̄ā·qaḏ·tî I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> haś·śā·rîm the princes, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- - בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the sons הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham·me·leḵ of the king, וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> wə·‘al and כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַלֹּבְשִׁ֖ים <WH3847> hal·lō·ḇə·šîm who are dressed מַלְבּ֥וּשׁ <WH4403> mal·būš apparel. נָכְרִֽי׃ <WH5237> nā·ḵə·rî in foreign

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh And בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> bā·‘êṯ time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> ha·hî at that אֲחַפֵּ֥שׂ <WH2664> ’ă·ḥap·pêś I will search אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> yə·rū·šā·lim Jerusalem בַּנֵּר֑וֹת <WH5216> ban·nê·rō·wṯ with lamps וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <WH6485> ū·p̄ā·qaḏ·tî and punish עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- - הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> hā·’ă·nā·šîm the men הַקֹּֽפְאִים֙ <WH7087> haq·qō·p̄ə·’îm settled עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- in שִׁמְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8105> šim·rê·hem complacency, ( Or thickening on the dregs) הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> hā·’ō·mə·rîm who say בִּלְבָבָ֔ם <WH3824> bil·ḇā·ḇām to themselves, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- will do nothing, יֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> yê·ṭîḇ either good יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh ‘ The LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō ... יָרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7489> yā·rê·a‘ or bad. ’
